plugin.name: Anchor Slider
plugin.description:
If you hate clicking a back to top link and getting that jarring jump to the top of the page, then this is the jquery plugin for you. Anchor Slider will gently slide your page up and down with built in easing and remove the disorientating jumps on pages.

Just add a class of 'anchorSlide' to your links. That's It! jQuery does the rest!

REQUIRES - jQuery: It's recommended that you install the jQuery plugin by Seb Duggan.
Plugin Written By: Mark Aplet
Find the latest version at: Visual28
